price: Gewiß, es ist dir gewährt, daß du darin weder hungerst noch nackt bist,
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: inna laka allā tajūʿa fīhā walā taʿrā
